SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_NEUTRAL, EffectController() )
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then if (target:GetZone() == ZONE_IN_PLAY) then local controller = target:GetController() target:DestroyWithoutRegenerate() for i=0, CountCardsInLibrary( controller ) do local card = controller:Library_GetNth(i) if card == nil then return else if card:GetCardType():Test(CARD_TYPE_CREATURE) ~= 0 then card:PutIntoPlay( controller ) return end end end controller:ShuffleLibrary() end end
